titles.title: Blow Upon Me, O Wind Of God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blow upon me, O wind of God.
Breathe upon me, O Spirit of the Lord.
Make my hands like those of skilled musicians.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Blow upon me, O wind of God.
Breathe upon me, O Spirit of the Lord.
Let me hear those melodies of heaven.
